name: Books to the Sky!
description:
Books to the sky!

Today your mission is to put a bunch of books on top of each other, sounds easy, right? However, you will have to avoid some areas and eventually you are not going to be able to keep it going! Try to do as much as you can, good luck!

Developed for Trijam #172 in ~3h.

Controls:

Mobile phone: Touch Screen

PC: Space bar/Left mouse click
